taglines.R666: Soft support, instant rebound — latex & spring combined
taglines.R888: Hotel-grade firm support, precise spinal alignment
taglines.R999: Flagship latex — the ultimate sleep experience
taglines.default: Hotel-grade sleep quality, direct from the factory

productDetail.tabMaterialContent: The top layer uses premium Belgian natural latex for consistent, lasting elasticity. The middle layer features Leggett & Platt (USA) high-carbon steel independent pocket springs in a precision array with silent design. The base layer is high-density resin cotton for structural stability. Fabric uses Bekaert (Belgium) imported material with DuPont Teflon (USA) textile technology.
productDetail.tabFeelContent: From the moment you lie down, feel the gentle wrap of the latex layer as your body naturally settles into a supported position. When turning, each spring moves independently — zero disturbance to your partner. After 10 minutes, pressure points across your body are evenly released and your spine maintains its natural curve. Suitable for back, side, and all sleeping positions.
productDetail.tabTechContent: Independent pocket spring technology: spring density precisely configured by body pressure zone, high-carbon steel wire heat-treated at 250–280°C. Baland's patented comfort resin cotton and high-elasticity seven-hole fiber cotton provide multi-layer support. Antibacterial & anti-mite treatment: YiKang (Korea) professional agent with imported fire-retardant cotton fabric, certified fire-retardant.
